title: Question 24
description: What if I deposit after the start of the epoch?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
When staling tokens during an epoch that’s currently running, your effective deposit amount will be proportionally reduced by the time that has passed from the start of the epoch. 

For example, if you deposit the funds in the middle of epoch, you’ll get a 0.5 multiplier. 

That’s why there is TVL and effective TVL displayed on BarnBridge platform.
